modelIdentification.name: RPR2 Physical FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: Representation of Physical Objects in Virtual World.
modelIdentification.description:
FOM Module representing Physical Entities including Platforms, Lifeforms, Munitions etc. Compatible with RPR-FOM v2.0 D17 encodings.
The AFMSTT Federation makes several changes: 1) Changes Marking Struct to a variable length to match NCTE. 2) Adds a several AWSIM attributes to the Aircraft class in the RPR2 Physical module. 3) Adds the JLVC AirDefense and SPArtillery sub-classes to GroundVehicle. 4) Changes publication and subscription flags to match actual use in the AFMSTT Federation.
modelIdentification.useHistory:
v1.0.1 Release Notes
- The RPR2 Physical FOM Module was derived from RPR-FOM v2.0 D17. It includes all Physical Entity object classes and all attributes are on-the wire encoding compatible with RPR-FOM v2.0 D17. - Datatype names have been made more readable than previous auto-generated naming.
v1.0.1r1 - Release Note - Replaced cardinality '0+' with 'Dynamic'
v1.0.1r2 - Release Note - Renamed enumerated data type Boolean to RPRboolean
v1.0.1r3 Release Note - Move many of the AFMSTT specific attributes from Aircraft to Flight including IsSleath, ATOIdentifier, MissionNumber, AircraftPerformanceData, FuelCurrent.
v1.0.1r4 Release Notes - Add ATOIdentifier and MissionNumber back into Aircraft as a deprecated attributes. To help AWSIMwith transition.
v1.0.1r5 - Add Force DDM dimension to all sub-classes of BaseEntity.

objectClass.name: PhysicalEntity
objectClass.semantics: A base class of all discrete platform scenario domain participants. Entities that can be treated as discrete simulation participants are derived from the PhysicalEntity object class. This object class tailors the behavior of the BaseEntity to include both articulated parts and several status attributes. The status attributes describe the current condition for those capabilities and states generally available to a large variety of physical entities. Articulated parts are attached components of the entity that may exhibit independent motion (such as landing gear or gun turrets). All of the attributes shall be treated as optional fields for federates updating instance attributes of this object class or its subclasses.

attribute.name: AcousticSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the acoustics (sound through air) signature state of the entity. Index pointer to a data table to define the acoustic signature state for the entity.

attribute.name: AlternateEntityType
attribute.semantics: The category of entity to be used when viewed by entities on the 'opposite' side. Guise function. Allows both sides of an engagement to see their own team members as 'friendly force' and their opponents as hostile. The force ID field is used to determine team membership.

attribute.name: ArticulatedParametersArray
attribute.semantics: Identification of the visible parts, and their states, of the entity which are capable of independent motion. The specification of articulation parameters for moveable parts and attached parts of an entity.

attribute.name: CamouflageType
attribute.semantics: The type of camouflage in use (if any). Describes the type of camouflage used on the entity.

attribute.name: DamageState
attribute.semantics: The state of damage of the entity. Describes the damaged appearance of an entity.

attribute.name: EngineSmokeOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's engine is generating smoke or not. True if entity is creating engine smoke.

attribute.name: FirePowerDisabled
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's main weapon system has been disabled or not. True if an entity's fire power has been disabled.

attribute.name: FlamesPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is on fire (with visible flames) or not. True if entity is aflame.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the entity belongs to. Enumeration distinguishing the different teams or sides in an exercise.

attribute.name: HasAmmunitionSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with ammunition.

attribute.name: HasFuelSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with fuel or not.

attribute.name: HasRecoveryCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to recover other entities or not.

attribute.name: HasRepairCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to repair other entities or not.

attribute.name: Immobilized
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is immobilized or not. True if the entity has been immobilized (mobility kill).

attribute.name: InfraredSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the infra-red signature state of the entity. Index pointer to a data table to define the infrared signature state for the entity.

attribute.name: IsConcealed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is concealed or not. True if entity is concealed.

attribute.name: LiveEntityMeasuredSpeed
attribute.semantics: The entity's own measurement of speed (e.g. air speed for aircraft).

attribute.name: Marking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the entity from other entities. Character set and the string of characters used to provide display identification for this entity.

attribute.name: PowerPlantOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's power plant is on or not. True if entity's power plant is on.

attribute.name: PropulsionSystemsData
attribute.semantics: The basic operating data of the propulsion systems aboard the entity.

attribute.name: RadarCrossSectionSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the radar cross section signature state of the entity. Index pointer to a data table to define the radar cross-section signature state for the entity.

attribute.name: SmokePlumePresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is generating smoke or not (intentional or unintentional). True if entity is creating a smoke plume.

attribute.name: TentDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed tent or not. True if entity's tent is deployed.

attribute.name: TrailingEffectsCode
attribute.semantics: The type and size of any trail that the entity is making. True if entity is creating a smoke trail.

attribute.name: VectoringNozzleSystemData
attribute.semantics: The basic operational data for the vectoring nozzle systems aboard the entity.

objectClass.name: Platform
objectClass.semantics: A physical object under the control of armed forces upon which sensor, communication, or weapon systems may be mounted. The Platform object class is a specialization of PhysicalEntity used to describe status information for vehicles, ships, and aircraft. All of its attributes are derived from the DIS EntityStatePDU (see Section 5.3.3.1 of IEEE 1278.1-1995). All of the attributes shall be treated as optional fields for federates updating instance attributes of this object class or its subclasses.

attribute.name: AfterburnerOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's afterburner is on or not. True if entity's afterburner is on.

attribute.name: AntiCollisionLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's anti-collision lights are on or not. True if anti-collision lights are on.

attribute.name: BlackOutBrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's black out brake lights are on or not. True if blackout brake lights are on.

attribute.name: BlackOutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's black out lights are on or not. True if blackout lights are on.

attribute.name: BrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's brake lights are on or not. True if brake lights are on.

attribute.name: FormationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's formation lights are on or not. True if formation lights are on.

attribute.name: HatchState
attribute.semantics: The state of the entity's (main) hatch. Describes the state of the primary hatch.

attribute.name: HeadLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's headlights are on or not. True if headlights are on.

attribute.notes: rpr2physical_2 rpr2physical_9 rpr2physical_10 rpr2physical_11 rpr2physical_13 rpr2physical_15
attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's internal lights are on or not. True if interior lights are on.

attribute.name: LandingLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's landing lights are on or not. True if landing lights are on.

attribute.name: LauncherRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's weapon launcher is in the raised position. True if entity's launcher is raised.

attribute.name: NavigationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's navigation lights are on or not. True if navigation lights are on.

attribute.name: RampDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed a ramp or not. True if entity's ramp is deployed.

attribute.name: RunningLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's running lights are on or not. True if running lights are on.

attribute.notes: rpr2physical_2 rpr2physical_9 rpr2physical_10 rpr2physical_11 rpr2physical_13 rpr2physical_15
attribute.name: SpotLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's spotlights are on or not. True if spot lights are on.

attribute.name: TailLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's tail lights are on or not. True if tail lights are on.

objectClass.name: Aircraft
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that operates mainly in the air, such as aircraft, balloons, etc. This includes the entities when they are on the ground.
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to the DIS Air domain in that it represents platform entities such as airplanes, balloons, etc. that operate mainly in the air, but that include some limited land operations. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.
Differs from the RPR-FOM definition in that it includes optional attributes from the AirTaskingOrder.

attribute.name: CallSign
attribute.semantics: The radio call sign for an aircraft (optional). For military air craft, the call sign of the lead aircraft is equivalent to the AIRCRAFT CALL SIGN defined in the MSNACFT set of the USMTF Air Tasking Order (ATO) (ex: HAMMER53). The call signs of subordinate aircraft have the same prefix as the leader, and sequential numbers (ex: HAMMER54, HAMMER55, etc.). For commercial civilian aircraft, the call sign is usually equivalent to the flight number (ex: SW273 for South West flight 273 from New York to Chicago). Spaces and other punctuation are not allowed in the call sign.

attribute.name: HomeBase
attribute.semantics: The optional International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) code for the air base that owns this aircraft (ex: KBWI for Baltimoreâ€“Washington International Airport).

attribute.name: Squadron
attribute.semantics: Reference to the squadron to which this aircart is currently assigned. May change if the squadron is split during forward operating location deployment or diversion. Required for all aircraft that are controlled by AWSIM or ABS. Optional otherwise.

attribute.name: ATOIdentifier
attribute.semantics:
Serial number of the ATO from which this aircraft's current mission was defined (optional). Equivalent to the FIELD 3 OF SET MSGID (MESSAGE SERIAL NUMBER) in the ATO. Blank if no mission is currently assigned.
Depreccated: remove in future version.

attribute.name: MissionNumber
attribute.semantics:
The identifying number assigned to a specific mission within an approved project, task, operation, or exercise (optional). May include numbers, letters, spaces, and punctuation (ex: D123HA). Equivalent to FIELD 2 OF SET AMSNDAT (MISSION NUMBER) in the ATO. Blank if no mission is currently assigned.
Depreccated: remove in future version.

objectClass.name: AmphibiousVehicle
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that can operate both on the land and the sea.
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to a cross between DIS Land and DIS Surface domains. It represents platforms that can operate both on the land and the sea. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: GroundVehicle
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that operates wholy on the surface of the earth.
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to the DIS Land domain in that it represents platforms that operate wholly on the surface of the earth. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: AirDefense
objectClass.semantics: Those entities in the GroundVehicle class that are Air Defense (ie. DIS Category == 28)

objectClass.name: SPArtillery
objectClass.semantics: Those entities in the GroundVehicle class that are Self-propelled Artillery (ie. DIS Category == 4)

objectClass.name: MultiDomainPlatform
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that operates in more than one domain (excluding those combinations explicitly defined as subclasses of the superclass of this class).
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to the DIS Other domain in that it represents platforms that operate in more than one domain (excluding those combinations explicitly defined as other subclasses of the Platform object class). This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: Spacecraft
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that operates mainly in space.
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to the DIS Space domain in that it represents platforms that operate mainly in space. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: SubmersibleVessel
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that operates either on the surface of the sea, or beneath it.
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to the DIS Subsurface domain in that it represents platforms that operate either on the surface of the sea, or beneath it. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: SurfaceVessel
objectClass.semantics:
A platform entity that operates wholy on the surface of the sea.
This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of Platform used to support DM filtering. It is equivalent to the DIS Surface domain in that it represents platforms that operate wholly on the surface of the sea. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: Lifeform
objectClass.semantics:
A living military platform (human or not).
The Lifeform object class is a specialization of PhysicalEntity used to describe individuals. This object class represents entities of the life form entity kind in DIS. All Lifeform attributes are derived from the DIS Entity State PDU. All attributes are optional for federates updating instance attributes of this object class or its subclasses.

attribute.name: FlashLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the lifeform's flash lights are on or not. True if flash lights are on.

attribute.name: StanceCode
attribute.semantics: The stance of the lifeform. Human behaviors (i.e., running, jumping, etc).

attribute.name: PrimaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier's primary weapon system. Describes the state of the lifeform's primary weapon.

attribute.name: SecondaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier's secondary weapon system. Describes the state of the lifeform's secondary weapon.

attribute.name: ComplianceState
attribute.semantics: The compliance of the lifeform. The compliance of the lifeform.

objectClass.name: Human
objectClass.semantics: A human lifeform. This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of the Lifeform used to support DM filtering. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: NonHuman
objectClass.semantics: An animal or other non-human lifeform. This object class provides an attributeless sub-class of the Lifeform used to support DM filtering. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: CulturalFeature
objectClass.semantics:
Engineering and natural effects such as craters, bridges, vehicle tracks, etc.
The CulturalFeature object class is a sub-class of PhysicalEntity used to describe the physical characteristics of engineering and natural effects such as buildings, craters, bridges, and vehicle tracks. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

attribute.name: ExternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's external lights are on or not. True if exterior lights are on.

attribute.name: InternalHeatSourceOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's internal heat source is on or not. True if interior heat source is on (for infrared viewing).

attribute.name: InternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's internal lights are on or not. True if interior lights are on.

objectClass.name: Munition
objectClass.semantics:
A complete device charged with explosives, propellants, pyrotechnics, initiating composition, or nuclear, biological or chemical material for use in military operations, including demolitions.
The Munition object class is used to describe the attributes of munitions that act as independent entities. Capabilities equivalent to the DIS Fire PDU and Detonation PDU are now provided by the WeaponFire and MunitionDetonation interaction classes. All of the attributes shall be treated as optional fields for federates updating instance attributes of this object class or its subclasses.

attribute.name: LauncherFlashPresent
attribute.semantics:
Whether the flash of the munition being launched is present or not. True if launcher flash is present when munition is fired.
Default Value: False

objectClass.name: Expendables
objectClass.semantics:
Countermeasures devices that are dispensed from another entity. The devices may be active emitters or passive reflectors of energy.
The Expendables object class is a sub-class of PhysicalEntity used to describe the physical characteristics of countermeasures devices that are dispensed from another entity. Although those devices may be active emitters or passive reflectors of energy, emissions are handled separately. It currently has no attributes. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: Radio
objectClass.semantics: Electronic devices for the communication of both audio and data, operated by entities belonging to armed forces. The Radio object class is an attributeless sub-class of PhysicalEntity used to describe the physical characteristics (location, appearance, etc.) of radio installations. It currently has no attributes. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: Sensor
objectClass.semantics:
Sensors and emitters, such as stand-alone radars, jammers, and detection systems, that are not part of another platform or system described by another Physical Entity, and are operated by armed forces.
The Sensor object class is a sub-class of PhysicalEntity used to describe the physical characteristics (location, appearance, etc.) of sensor installations such as radars. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

attribute.name: AntennaRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's antenna is raised or not. True if the antenna has been raised.

attribute.name: BlackoutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's blackout lights are on or not. True if blackout lights are on.

attribute.name: LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's lights are on or not. True if other lights are on.

attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's interior lights are on or not. True if interior lights are on.

attribute.name: MissionKill
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter has sustained damage that will prevent it carrying out its mission or not (ew.g. damaged antenna). True if mission capability is disabled (e.g. damaged antenna).

objectClass.name: Supplies
objectClass.semantics:
Supplies other than munitions, such as fuel, food and personnel.
The Supplies object class is a sub-class of PhysicalEntity used to describe the physical characteristics of supplies other than munitions, such as fuel, food and personnel. It currently has no attributes. This object class is publishable because it qualifies as a leaf node of the RPR FOM.

objectClass.name: CounterMeasures
objectClass.semantics:
Simpler counter measure implementation, originated by AWSIM
This class was added to the official RPR-FOM module from the JLVCv6r23 FOM. Eventually, it should go into a separate module.

attribute.name: HostObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Entity \"dropping\" counter measures.

objectClass.name: Chaff
objectClass.semantics:
Two types of chaff clouds exist, packette and corridor. Packet modeling is defined by a center point from base entity spatial, and a radius. Corridor modeling is a straight cylinder, defined by two points, base entity spatial and EndPoint and a radius.
This class was added to the official RPR-FOM module from the JLVCv6r23 FOM. Eventually, it should go into a separate module.

attribute.name: ChaffIdentifier
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Type of Chaff

attribute.name: ChaffType
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Type of Chaff \"drop\" (corridor or packet)

attribute.name: EndPoint
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Second point defining chaff cylinder.

attribute.name: RFSpectralCoverage_High
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. High end of effective band.

attribute.name: RFSpectralCoverage_Low
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Low end of effective band

attribute.name: RadarCrossSection
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Radar reflectivity of sphere with specified radius

attribute.name: Radius
attribute.semantics: REQUIRED. Radio of packette cloud, or around corridor line.

objectClass.name: Flare
objectClass.semantics:
simple flares
This class was added to the official RPR-FOM module from the JLVCv6r23 FOM. Eventually, it should go into a separate module.

attribute.name: FlareIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Type of flare

attribute.name: IRSpectralCoverage_High
attribute.semantics: High end of effective band

attribute.name: IRSpectralCoverage_Low
attribute.semantics: Low end of effective IR band

attribute.name: PeakOutput
attribute.semantics: IR Signal strength.

interactionClass.name: Collision
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact.

parameter.name: CollidingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectMass
parameter.semantics: The mass of the issuing object.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the issuing object at the moment of impact.

parameter.name: CollisionLocation
parameter.semantics: The location of the collision relative to the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID assigned by the issuing object to associate related collision events.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object that has detected the collision and issued the collision interaction.

interactionClass.name: CollisionElastic
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact in an elastic manner. An elastic collision allows a higher fidelity collision to be modeled, taking into account linear and rotational momentum transfer, variable elasticity, and momentum transfer that is dependent on surface orientation.

parameter.name: CoefficientOfRestitution
parameter.semantics: The degree that energy is conserved in a collision.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXX
parameter.semantics: X-X Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXY
parameter.semantics: X-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXZ
parameter.semantics: X-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYY
parameter.semantics: Y-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYZ
parameter.semantics: Y-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultZZ
parameter.semantics: Z-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: UnitSurfaceNormal
parameter.semantics: The normal vector to the surface at the point of collision detection

simpleData.name: Velocity_dm_per_second_Integer16
simpleData.semantics: Velocity/Speed measured as deci-metre per second.

simpleData.name: dBsm_Integer16
simpleData.semantics: decibel measure of the radar cross section (RCS) of a target relative to one square meter.

simpleData.name: Feet_Float32
simpleData.semantics: feet expressed as a 32 bit float

simpleData.name: KillowattsPerSteradian_Float32
simpleData.semantics: Killowatt/steradian expressed as a float value

enumeratedData.name: TrailingEffectsCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Type/Size of a trail that an entity is making.

enumeratedData.name: PowerSetting_Enum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Field value Engine Power Setting -100 Engine Off 0 Idle Power 50 Mil. Power (Aircraft) 51 Min. A/B (Aircraft) 100 Max. Power, Max. A/B (Aircraft)

arrayData.name: PropulsionSystemDataStructArray
arrayData.semantics: A set of Propulsion System Data descriptions.

arrayData.name: VectoringNozzleSystemDataStructArray
arrayData.semantics: A set of Vectoring Nozzle System Data description.

arrayData.name: MarkingArray11
arrayData.semantics: String of characters represented by an 11 element character string

fixedRecordData.name: MarkingStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Character set used in the marking and the string of characters to be interpreted for display.

field.name: MarkingData
field.semantics: List of characters that make up the marking. Must be null terminated if the MarkingEncodingType is ASCII. Markings longer than 11 characters will be truncated when translated to DIS.

fixedRecordData.name: PropulsionSystemDataStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Information describing a propulsion system in terms of power settings and current RPM.

field.name: PowerSetting
field.semantics: The power setting of the propulsion system, after any response lags have been incorporated

fixedRecordData.name: VectoringNozzleSystemDataStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Operational data for describing the vectoring nozzle systems being simulated.

field.name: HorizontalDeflectionAngle
field.semantics: The nozzle deflection angle in the horizontal body axis of the entity.

field.name: VerticalDeflectionAngle
field.semantics: The nozzle deflection angle in the vertical body axis of the entity.

note.label: COPY-noteLabel_22
note.semantics: If there is no object instance associated with the attribute, then this should be set to the empty string (no characters).

note.label: COPY-noteLabel_24
note.semantics: This must reference a valid Object instance.

note.label: COPY-COPY-VOMT_AUTOGEN_DATATYPE
note.semantics: Automatically generated data type from an HLA 1.3 OMT file, please verify
